#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define DRT() int t;cin>>t;while(t--)
#define ll long long int
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	//DRT()
	//{	
		ll L,R,q,n,prime[100000]={0};
		vector<ll> v;
		vector<ll>::iterator it_L,it_R;
		for(ll i=2;i<=100000;i++)
		{
			if(prime[i]==0)
			{
				v.push_back(i*i);//squares of primes
				//cout<<i*i<<endl;
				for(ll j=i;j<=100000;j+=i)
				{
					prime[j]=1;
				}
			}
		}
		//cout<<v.size()<<endl;
		cin>>q;
		ll c_L,c_R;
		while(q--)
		{
			cin>>L>>R;
			//cout<<L<<R<<endl;
			c_L=lower_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),L)-v.begin();
			c_R=lower_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),R+1)-v.begin();
			cout<<c_R-c_L<<endl;
		}
	//}
	return 0;
}
